wikipedia_page.main: Richard Calvert Stafford (23 July 1893 – 1 December 1912)  was an English rugby union player. He played four times for the England national rugby union team in 1912 but died later that year aged only nineteen.

response: * England rugby caps: Horace Finlinson, WB Thomson, Edgar Mobbs (captain), Arthur Gilbert Bull, Dick Stafford, Harold Day, Dickie Jeeps (captain) and Lionel Edward Weston

link_mentions.page: List of England national rugby union players
